build rc2

This is a regression introduced with latest revision. Suggest to fix for RC3.

David please attach your patch.

Once done, Dani and Darin, please approve for RC3.

Created an attachment (id=40247)
Proposed patch

Since no steps are provided, it is not possible to construct a regression test. However this bug looks serious enough to add a null check protection.
Darin and Dani, can you please approve for 3.2 RC3 ?
The patch looks good - approving for 3.2 RC3.
